concept.title: Literals
concept.shortdesc: The expression language includes the following literals:

ul.li: expression languageliteralsliteralsin the expression languageBoolean literals - "true" and "false"
Strings with single or double quotation marks
Escape characters for strings: \ to escape quotation marks, and \\ to escape \is this escape info right, translated from (what I thought was) gibberish
